name: John Kremer
seeking: John Kremer at Business Skills offers business skills training and consulting, making him a natural JV partner for online course platforms, mastermind group organizers, or entrepreneurs who serve small business owners and solopreneurs seeking structured growth frameworks. He would benefit from co-promotion deals with list-based marketers and podcast hosts in the entrepreneurship and small business space who can introduce his training programs to audiences actively seeking practical business education.
what_you_do: Provide business skills training and consulting services.
offering: Business skills training and consulting programs
business_focus: Provide business skills training and consulting services.

jv_history.partner_name: This Guy Can Sell Books: Tom Antion Interviews John Kremer
jv_history.source_quote: marketing expert Tom Antion interviews book marketing expert John Kremer on how to write and market your books. Introduction of John Kremer by Tom Antion Book marketing expert John Kremer
